content: उपागम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To come, approach, go or draw near (a person or place). {@--2@} ({%a%}) To go to, go to the state of; पंचत्वमुपागतः or परां तृप्तिमुपागतः; so क्रोधं, मोहं, क्षयं &c. ({%b%}) To undergo, suffer, endure. {@--3@} To obtain, get; दायादुपागतो दासः <ls>Mit.</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 143.</ls> {@--4@} To occur, fall to the lot of.
